name: Adefowope Odueyungbo
title: Assistant Professor (Part-Time), Health Research Methods, Evidence, and Impact
overview: I am a clinical biostatistician with several years of experience supporting clinical trials and regulatory filings in multiple therapeutic areas, including Infectious Diseases, Oncology, Vaccines, Endocrinology, etc.
